name: git-update-tool
description: git update tool for many projects

scripts.pub:major: sh build/build.sh && yarn v:major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.pub:minor: sh build/build.sh && yarn v:minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.pub:patch: sh build/build.sh && yarn v:patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

author: muzi131313 <muzi131313@163.com>
